hack on phire heavy industries https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/tags/hack/ Recent content in hack on phire heavy industries Hugo -- gohugo.io en-us Wed, 11 May 2022 00:00:00 +0000 Baby Encription https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/p/baby-encription/ Wed, 11 May 2022 00:00:00 +0000 https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/p/baby-encription/

You are after an organised crime group which is responsible for the illegal weapon market in your country. As a secret agent, you have infiltrated the group enough to be included in meetings with clients. During the last negotiation, you found one of the confidential messages for the customer. It contains crucial information about the delivery. Do you think you can decrypt it?

I cannot reverse the code for the file but i can run the samething and compare to the string that i already have.

enc = "6e0a9372ec49a3f6930ed8723f9df6f6720ed8d89dc4937222ec7214d89d1e0e352ce0aa6ec82bf622227bb70e7fb7352249b7d893c493d8539dec8fb7935d490e7f9d22ec89b7a322ec8fd80e7f8921"

a = bytes.fromhex(enc)

#print(a)

decrypted = ""

for char in a:
    for key in range(1, 126):
        if ((123 * key + 18) % 256) == char:
            decrypted += chr(key)
            
print(decrypted)

Sideloading https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/p/sideloading/ Wed, 13 Apr 2022 00:00:00 +0000 https://www.phireheavyindustries.com"/p/sideloading/

After a couple of years working from home it felt good to finally return to working in a physical office with people again. Even if it’s somewhat temporary and kind of scary to be around people, it gave me a fresh perspective on work. I don’t like to admit it but i’m not that productive working exclusively from home. It remains to be seen what kind of schedule i can adopt between office and home, but for now it feels good to have a little more contact with the world.

As for work, i am now a certified Power BI Data Analyst Associate and also a Qualtrics Research Core Expert. I work most of the time inside Power BI, and in sysadmin tasks.

Recently i took an interest in the pentesting and redteaming subjects, and i’m working through the Hack the Box and TryHackMe challenges. I find it very challenging but fun. I like the idea of hacking and working through these challenges, like they were puzzles.
